parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value>  arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Tree View

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value>  Sets the select color of given path.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> ctrl [[tvSetSelectColor]] [path, color]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> ctrl: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] - Path of the item

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> color: [[Array]] - Color RGBA

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_control [[tvSetSelectColor]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[0, 0], [1,1,1,0.5]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[tvSetColor]]
</value></part></template></root>
